name: VR Interior Designer Pro
description:
Virtually experience your designs getting up close and personal with unique furnishings that were modeled into this virtual world.

Through use of the HTC Vive, VR Interior Designer Pro can transport you into a custom designed penthouse room allowing you to pick up and move furnishings, teleport to different locations in the space, and swap out or change your decorative accessories in real time. We have also included the classic designer kitchen visual experience as well.

Additionally, this is an example to the service EdgeHill CGI provides to actual interior designers.
